title: Abbey Clancy marks 30th birthday as Peter Crouch buys her a Mercedes
title_page: Abbey Clancy marks 30th birthday as Peter Crouch buys her a Mercedes | Daily Mail Online
text:
It's not every day a girl turns 30, so footballer Peter Crouch took celebrations up a few gears by surprising his model wife with a vintage Mercedez Benz.
The Stoke City star treated his wife of four years to the classic motor manufactured on the actual day she was born, to make her milestone birthday unforgettable on Sunday.
As if that wasn't enough fireworks for one day, the model and mother-of-two posted a string of pictures on Instagram of her hand-held sparklers at dinner captioning it: ' So lucky to have such wonderful family and friends.'
Scroll down for video
Abbey birthday: Abbey Clancy marks 30th birthday with sparklers at dinner after hubby Peter Crouch buys her vintage Mercedez
Abbey, whose gearing up for her role as head judge on Britain's Next Top Model, oozed glamour in her get-up .
She opted to cover up her curves in an elegant sleeved mini-dress as she joined friends and family to mark her special day.
Abbey smoldered in the black and white pics that captured her intimate 30th dinner. She ramped up the raunch with a bold smokey eye - and kept her pout nude and glossy.
Lucky lady: The beauty was treated to a selection of cakes as she enjoyed her birthday treat

Unforgettable: Abbey was treated to a tray of cupcakes to mark her milestone birthday
The Strictly Come Dancing beauty accompanied her endearing pictures - where she was presented with a tray of Happy Birthday cupcakes: 'Happy birthday to me he he xx so lucky to have such wonderful family and friends.'
The model, who has two daughters with England footballer Peter, was more than likely referring to the incredibly generous gift her football ace hubby bought her.
Sharing a photo of the shiny 300 SL convertible on Instagram, she revealed it was an especially thoughtful gift as it was created on the day she was born.
Golden girl: Abbey Clancy looked phenomenal at her birthday dinner - where she was presented a tray of birthday cupcakes
Mum's night off: The model, who has two daughters with England footballer Peter, was over the moon to celebrate with loved ones
She wrote: 'My birthday present 1986 @mercedesbenzuk sl300 born the same day as me.'
It's not the first gift she's received either, as yesterday she was treated to a pampering session at the salon of luxury hair stylist Paul Edmonds and was given a huge bouquet of white roses.
Abbey has kids Sophia, four, and seven-month-old Liberty, with Peter, 34.
The couple were married in a star-studded ceremony at Stapleford Park Hotel in Leicestershire in June 2011 - three months after the birth of their first child.
